title: Lesson 18
paragraph: Verbs for injuries, crime, admiration, and polite interactions.

words.meaning: to cause physical harm or damage
words.japaneseMeaning: けがをさせる／損傷する
words.example: He injured his arm playing soccer.

words.meaning: to take property illegally from a person or place
words.example: The bank was robbed last night.

words.meaning: to fire a weapon or send out a projectile
words.example: He learned to shoot at the range.

words.meaning: to regard with respect or warm approval
to have enough money to pay for
words.japaneseMeaning: 余裕がある／買う余裕がある

words.meaning: to make someone slightly angry or irritated
words.japaneseMeaning: イライラさせる／悩ます
